Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: People have become more aware and concerned with the government's allocation of funds for various programs. Recent articles highlighted that after next month's Federal Budget scrutiny will increase to ensure that taxpayer money is being spent effectively. The aim is to evaluate whether different programs are working in the bigger picture to improve productivity and economic output of the country. People are interested in how their tax dollars are allocated and seek transparency in all levels of government.
